siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Faithful Listener, Today Jon’s audio quality is a little deteriorated due to recording at home. Why is he at home and not in Studio? The joys of home ownership. Listen in to hear Jon’s first fix as a homeowner. Next up, Stan has 2 reviews on milkshakes. First a milkshake…

frontmatter.title: Episode 21 - Homeownership Woes, Milkshakes and Meatloaf (The food, not the hiphop artist)
